marno.protocol

Interface RMIServerInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RMIServer

    public interface RMIServerInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    The RMI interface implemented by RMI servers.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String connect(java.lang.String username, RMIClientInterface client)
      Sends a connection request to the RMI server.
      void disconnect(java.lang.String sessionId)
      Disconnects this client from the server.
      void rename(java.lang.String sessionId, java.lang.String newUsername)
      Changes the client's username.
      void sendMessage(java.lang.String sessionId, java.lang.String message)
      Sends a new public message to the server from this client.
      void sendPrivateMessage(java.lang.String sessionId, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String message)
      Sends a new private message to another client.

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        java.lang.String connect(java.lang.String username,
                         RMIClientInterface client)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Sends a connection request to the RMI server.
        Parameters:
        username - the initial username value for the client
        client - the RMI client trying to connect
        Returns:
        the session ID
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if an error occurred

      • rename

        void rename(java.lang.String sessionId,
            java.lang.String newUsername)
     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Changes the client's username.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the client's session ID
        newUsername - the new value of the client's username
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if an error occurred

      • sendMessage

        void sendMessage(java.lang.String sessionId,
                 java.lang.String message)
          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Sends a new public message to the server from this client.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the client's session ID
        message - the message contents
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if an error occurred

      • sendPrivateMessage

        void sendPrivateMessage(java.lang.String sessionId,
                        java.lang.String username,
                        java.lang.String message)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Sends a new private message to another client.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the client's session ID
        username - the username of the destination user
        message - the message contents
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if an error occurred

      • disconnect

        void disconnect(java.lang.String sessionId)
         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Disconnects this client from the server.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the client's session ID
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if an error occurred
